snippet.title: Broken Sword 3: The Sleeping Dragon trailer
snippet.description: The third game in the series, this trailer for BS:TSD briefly recaps on the past 2 games and shows off the new 3D engine used. The game was released in 2003 and is still available on PC, PS2 and Xbox.
